U

unitTests - package unitTests
 
up - Variable in class gameplay.Keyboard
Specifies if UP key was pressed
update() - Method in class gameplay.Keyboard
Updates booleans if the corresponding keys were pressed, calls pause if pause key is detected.
update(Game, Player, Player) - Method in class gameplay.Level
Handles player position updates and collision checking.
update(Level) - Method in class gameplay.Player
Updates player position in Level object
updateRecords(String, int, String, int) - Method in class crud.StatsFileSystem
This method updates the versus records of two users user1 and user2 in the stats array.
updateStats(User, User) - Method in class accounts.Statistics
Update the statsArray, where all the info is still temporarily stored in memory.
updateStatsFile() - Method in class accounts.Statistics
Write the stats info in memory to the file.
User - Class in accounts
The User class is responsible to contain the info of one User.
User(String) - Constructor for class accounts.User
Initialize a new User object with only an username.
User(String, int) - Constructor for class accounts.User
Constructor used only for calculating top ten players.
userOneLogin() - Method in class accounts.Login
This method is used to identify whether userOne is logged in
userTwoLogin() - Method in class accounts.Login
This method is used to identify whether userTwo is logged in
